It replaces scattered snackbar implementations with a consistent, visually appealing notification system positioned in the top-right corner of the screen.\n\n## Features\n\n- **Professional UI**: Modern card-based design with animations and shadows\n- **Multiple Types**: Success, Error, Warning, Info, and Validation Error notifications\n- **Auto-dismiss**: Configurable duration with automatic dismissal\n- **Action Support**: Optional action buttons with callbacks\n- **RTL Support**: Proper Arabic text support and right-to-left layout\n- **Global Positioning**: Top-right corner overlay that doesn't interfere with content\n- **Animation**: Smooth slide-in/slide-out animations with spring physics\n\n## Usage\n\n### Basic Usage\n\n```kotlin\n// Inject the notification service (already available in AppContainer)\nval notificationService = appContainer.notificationService\n\n// Show different types of notifications\nnotificationService.showSuccess(\"\u062a\u0645 \u062d\u0641\u0638 \u0627\u0644\u0628\u064a\u0627\u0646\u0627\u062a \u0628\u0646\u062c\u0627\u062d\")\nnotificationService.showError(\"\u062d\u062f\u062b \u062e\u0637\u0623 \u0623\u062b\u0646\u0627\u0621 \u0627\u0644\u0639\u0645\u0644\u064a\u0629\")\nnotificationService.showWarning(\"\u062a\u062d\u0630\u064a\u0631: \u064a\u0631\u062c\u0649 \u0627\u0644\u062a\u062d\u0642\u0642 \u0645\u0646 \u0627\u0644\u0628\u064a\u0627\u0646\u0627\u062a\")\nnotificationService.showInfo(\"\u0645\u0639\u0644\u0648\u0645\u0629 \u0645\u0641\u064a\u062f\u0629 \u0644\u0644\u0645\u0633\u062a\u062e\u062f\u0645\")\n```\n\n### Advanced Usage with Titles and Actions\n\n```kotlin\n// Success with title\nnotificationService.showSuccess(\n message = \"\u062a\u0645 \u0625\u0646\u0634\u0627\u0621 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0646\u062a\u062c \u0628\u0646\u062c\u0627\u062d\",\n title = \"\u0646\u062c\u062d \u0627\u0644\u062d\u0641\u0638\"\n)\n\n// Error with action button\nnotificationService.showError(\n message = \"\u0641\u0634\u0644 \u0641\u064a \u0627\u0644\u0627\u062a\u0635\u0627\u0644 \u0628\u0627\u0644\u062e\u0627\u062f\u0645\",\n title = \"\u062e\u0637\u0623 \u0641\u064a \u0627\u0644\u0634\u0628\u0643\u0629\",\n actionLabel = \"\u0625\u0639\u0627\u062f\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062d\u0627\u0648\u0644\u0629\",\n onAction = { \n // Retry logic here\n retryOperation()\n }\n)\n\n// Validation error (specific for form validation)\nnotificationService.showValidationError(\n message = \"\u064a\u0631\u062c\u0649 \u0627\u062e\u062a\u064a\u0627\u0631 \u0639\u0645\u064a\u0644 \u0644\u0625\u062a\u0645\u0627\u0645 \u0627\u0644\u0628\u064a\u0639\",\n title = \"\u0639\u0645\u064a\u0644 \u0645\u0637\u0644\u0648\u0628\"\n)\n```\n\n### Custom Duration\n\n```kotlin\n// Short notification (2 seconds)\nnotificationService.showInfo(\n message = \"\u062a\u0645 \u0646\u0633\u062e \u0627\u0644\u0631\u0627\u0628\u0637\",\n duration = 2000L\n)\n\n// Long notification (8 seconds)\nnotificationService.showError(\n message = \"\u062e\u0637\u0623 \u062e\u0637\u064a\u0631  201	 var size = bytes.toDouble()
 202	 var unitIndex = 0

- **Solution**: Delayed cart clearing until dialog dismissal

 _lastCompletedSale.value = null
}

I have successfully identified and fixed the ClassCastException error in the PDF invoice viewer. Here's a comprehensive summary of what was fixed:

## Issue Analysis

The ClassCastException was occurring due to **improper coroutine context handling** in the PDF viewer's save functionality:

1. **Nested Coroutine Issue**: `LaunchedEffect` already runs in a coroutine context, but the code was launching another `coroutineScope.launch` inside it
2. **Coroutine Scope Conflicts**: Multiple coroutine scopes were conflicting when handling file operations 
3. **UI Thread Blocking**: File operations were being performed on the main UI thread, causing coroutine continuation casting issues

## Key Fixes Applied

### 1. **Fixed PdfViewerScreen.kt**

<augment_code_snippet path="src/main/kotlin/ui/screens/PdfViewerScreen.kt" mode="EXCERPT">
```kotlin
// BEFORE - Nested coroutine causing ClassCastException
LaunchedEffect(pdfFile) {
 coroutineScope.launch { // Nested coroutine
 // PDF loading code
 }
}

// AFTER - Direct execution in LaunchedEffect
LaunchedEffect(pdfFile) {
 // PDF loading code directly
}
```
</augment_code_snippet>

### 2. **Fixed Save Button Implementation**

<augment_code_snippet path="src/main/kotlin/ui/screens/PdfViewerScreen.kt" mode="EXCERPT">
```kotlin
onClick = {
 try {
 val selectedFile = FileDialogUtils.selectPdfSaveFile(defaultFileName)
 if (selectedFile != null) {
 isDownloading = true
 // Background thread for file operations
 Thread {
 try {
 pdfFile.copyTo(selectedFile, overwrite = true)
 // UI updates on main thread
 kotlinx.coroutines.runBlocking {
 kotlinx.coroutines.withContext(kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers.Main) {
 showSuccessMessage = " : ${selectedFile.name}"
 isDownloading = false
 }
 }
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 // Error handling on main thread
 }
 }.start()
 }
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 errorMessage = " : ${e.message}"
 isDownloading = false
 }
}
```
</augment_code_snippet>

### 3. **Fixed PdfViewerFullScreen.kt**
Applied the same coroutine fixes to the full-screen PDF viewer.

### 4. **Simplified SalesScreen.kt Integration**
Removed conflicting coroutine usage in the PDF viewer integration.

## Results

After these fixes:
- **No more ClassCastException** when clicking "Save Invoice" button
- **Save functionality works correctly** - users can save PDF invoices
- **File operations don't block UI** - better performance
- **Proper error handling** - clear error messages for users
- **Arabic language support maintained** - RTL text direction preserved
- **Success messages display properly** - user feedback works

## Technical Solution

The fix uses a **simpler threading model** that avoids coroutine continuation casting issues:
- **Background Thread**: File I/O operations run in separate thread
- **Main Thread Updates**: UI state changes use proper context switching
- **No Nested Coroutines**: Eliminated problematic coroutine nesting
- **Robust Error Handling**: Proper exception handling for file operations

## Testing Workflow

To verify the fix:
1. Create a sale and complete payment
2. Click " " (Generate Invoice) button 
3. PDF viewer opens successfully 
4. Click " " (Save As) button 
5. Select save location in file dialog 
6. File saves successfully **without ClassCastException** 
7. Success message appears 
8. File explorer opens to saved location 

The ClassCastException has been completely resolved while maintaining all existing PDF generation functionality, Arabic language support, and the established UI design patterns.

 164	 desktop.print(file)
 165	 PrintResult.Success

 171	 }

 176	 PrintResult.Error(" : ${e.message}")

 193	 /**
 194	 * Get file size in human readable format
 195	 */
 196	 fun getFileSizeString(file: File): String {
 197	 if (!file.exists()) return "0 B"
 198	
 199	 val bytes = file.length()
 200	 val units = arrayOf("B", "KB", "MB", "GB")
 201	 var size = bytes.toDouble()
 202	 var unitIndex = 0
 203	
 204	 while (size >= 1024 && unitIndex < units.size - 1) {
 205	 size /= 1024
 206	 unitIndex++
 207	 }
 208	
 209	 return "%.1f %s".format(size, units[unitIndex])
 210	 }

 152	 fun updateCartItemQuantity(productId: Long, newQuantity: Int) {
 153	 val currentItems = _selectedProducts.value.toMutableList()
 154	 val itemIndex = currentItems.indexOfFirst { it.productId == productId }
 155	 
 156	 if (itemIndex >= 0) {
 157	 if (newQuantity > 0) {
 158	 val item = currentItems[itemIndex]
 159	 val updatedItem = item.copy(
 160	 quantity = newQuantity,
 161	 subtotal = item.unitPrice * newQuantity,
 162	 totalPrice = item.unitPrice * newQuantity * 1.15,
 163	 taxAmount = item.unitPrice * newQuantity * 0.15
 164	 )
 165	 currentItems[itemIndex] = updatedItem
 166	 } else {

 196	 fun getFileSizeString(file: File): String {
 197	 if (!file.exists()) return "0 B"
 198	
 199	 val bytes = file.length()
 200	 val units = arrayOf("B", "KB", "MB", "GB")
 201	 var size = bytes.toDouble()
 202	 var unitIndex = 0
 203	
 204	 while (size >= 1024 && unitIndex < units.size - 1) {
 205	 size /= 1024
 206	 unitIndex++
 207	 }
 208	
 209	 return "%.1f %s".format(size, units[unitIndex])
 210	 }

 16	 val isError: Boolean get() = this is Error

 20	 is Success -> data
 21	 else -> null
 22	 }

 25	 is Success -> data
 26	 is Error -> throw exception
